snippet: The reigning champion, Celtic, is on the verge of retaining the Scottish Premier League title after thrashing Dundee, 5-0.
abstract: Celtic, going for its fourth title in so many years, soundly defeats Dundee 5-0 in Scottish Premier League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The reigning champion, Celtic, is on the verge of retaining the Scottish Premier League title after thrashing Dundee, 5-0.
